scripts.test: nodemon -w tests -w src -e .py -x cross-env LOGURU_LEVEL=TRACE rye run pytest -k test_deeplx_tr
scripts.pytest: nodemon -w tests -w deeplx_tr -e .py -x pytest tests deeplx_tr
scripts.style: nodemon -w deeplx_tr -w tests -x "black tests deeplx_tr && python -m flake8"
scripts.docstyle: nodemon -w deeplx_tr -w tests -x pydocstyle --convention=google tests deeplx_tr
